cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 155 miles WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Meandering over the southern Bay of Campeche through Thursday, then expected to drift northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico later in the 5-day period
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central U.S. Gulf Coast (likely Louisiana coastline)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast; portions of Veracruz, Tabasco, and Campeche states; potential northward impact to the central Gulf Coast later in the period
